full-range dealership operating out of the Mumbai Metropolitan Region wherein we have 12 sales touchpoints for the convenience of our customers. In Nerul, Thane, Vasai, Bhiwandi, Sakinaka, Ulhasnagar, Dombivli, Vadkhal.

Booking Type
about us

The Brand You Know

Shriniwas Vehicles is a full-range dealership operating out of the Mumbai Metropolitan region wherein we have 12 sales touchpoints for the convenience of our customers. In Nerul, Thane, Vasai, Bhiwandi, Boisar, Miraroad, Sakinaka, Ulhasnagar, Dombivli, and Vadkhal We have large workshops capable of servicing over 50 trucks at the same time at strategic points in Bhiwandi on the Mumbai- Nashik highway and Nallasopara on the Mumbai Ahmedabad highway. Our workshops have world-class facilities, including Tata Motors ltd trained technicians, the most modern special tools, Pilot waiting, resting and preparing rooms, wheel alignment and balancing facilities, etc.

Why Your Should Use Our Services

Lowest prices on commercial vehicles guaranteed

At Shriniwas Vehicles, we offer the best discount on tata commercial vehicles. Tata trucks, buses.
View Detail

Easiest Way to Sell Your Truck - Tata OK

A TATA OK certified pre-owned commercial vehicle will continue to be a solid investment for your business. Sell, buy or exchange your vehicle of any brand, age, or condition at Shriniwas Vehicles.
